titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer certain National Forest System land to Custer County, South Dakota.
Custer County Airport Conveyance Act
Custer County Airport Conveyance Act
Custer County Airport Conveyance Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Custer County Airport Conveyance Act
This bill directs the Forest Service, if Custer County in South Dakota offers to acquire approximately 65.7 acres of National Forest System land in the county for market value, to convey such land to the county.
